This page on SteamDB lists all games tagged as 'Platformer'. Platformer is a genre of video games where the player character typically moves by jumping from one platform to another in a side-scrolling perspective. These games often involve precise timing and quick reflexes, making for engaging and challenging gameplay experiences. Developers and Steam users apply this tag to games that fit the description, ensuring accurate categorization and easy discovery by players interested in platforming games.
